Package de.kaleidox.crystalshard.util.discord.ui

Class DialogueBranch<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.kaleidox.crystalshard.util.discord.ui.Dialogue
      • de.kaleidox.crystalshard.util.discord.ui.DialogueBranch<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - The type of the object that is requested.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogueEndpoint, DialoguePassthrough
    public class DialogueBranch<A>
extends Dialogue
    This class represents a possible branch in a Discord Dialogue. Each branch except the root branch results from a previous branch; and is the product of a specified Option.

    A Branch consists of a ResponseElement and a List of Options. Those Options require a Predicate to test the result of the Branches ResponseElement, and a sub-branch that will start if the Predicate is turning out true.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  DialogueBranch.Option<B>
      This subclass represents an option of the result.
